ChicagoBlackBeltTakesDownManWhoAllegedly.name: Chicago black belt takes down man who allegedly punched 7-Eleven clerk
ChicagoBlackBeltTakesDownManWhoAllegedly.summary: A Chicago man with years of experience in self-defense took matters into his own hands when another man allegedly punched a 7-Eleven employee on the North Side.

GoodSamaritanStopsChildAbductionwithJiu-.name: Good Samaritan Stops Child Abduction with Jiu-Jitsu! | Crimes Gone Viral | ID
GoodSamaritanStopsChildAbductionwithJiu-.summary: On November 9, 2020, in Madison Square Park, a man attempted to abduct a baby from a stroller. A trained martial arts coach named Brian intervened, using Jiu-Jitsu to safely restrain the attacker for 17 minutes until authorities arrived. Brian's actions were widely praised, and he was recognized as a hero for preventing further harm.
